summary: This simple little spell adds 10 Gold to your inventory with every cast.
descriptionHtml:
Thank you for downloading and trying SoulMaster\'s Create Wealth Spell

[color=#FFFF00]This simple little spell adds 10 Gold to your inventory with every cast.

The Create Wealth Spell Tome can be found for sale at vendors throughout Skyrim.[/color]

[color=#00FF00]Installation:

Download and install with Nexus Mod Manager[/color]

Please leave any feedback or bug reports.

I hope you enjoy using the Spell

[color=#00FFFF]Please take note: If you are using a pirated (ie non Steam enabled) version of the game, please do not leave comments about how this part of my mod or that is not working on your game! I am not prepared to waste my time trying to help you out with your illegal software! I\'m unemployed, but still manage to pay for my games (they are what keep me sane) so if I can, you should be able to as well![/color]

SoulMasterII

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/sm0g9rv24znf_zps9d795d9a.gif[/IMG]

[color=#FF0000]Version History:
V1.0 Initial upload
V1.1 Changed screen display text when spell cast[/color]

[color=#FFFF00]Please, DO NOT upload any part of my mods anywhere else![/color]
author: SoulMasterII

files.name: SoulMasters Create Wealth Spell v1-1
files.changelogHtml: Changed screen display text when spell cast
